item.title: Ethical Apps on Greenpeace Podcast
item.description: Did a interview about ethical apps on the Greenpeace Podcast. Its a great new podcast and I had a great time speaking with them. Listen The podcast is also up on soundcloud so you can hear my first segment or the entire show from there.
